name: Cow Clicker
description:
My first "proper" game. ↑↑ Before came many experiments. ↓↓ It is simple right now, ←→ but ←→ there are a few easter eggs. BA,

NOTE: THERE IS ONLY A 64 BIT VERSION ATM. It shouldn't cause any problems if you have a 32 bit device afaik. In the next update I will make both a 64 bit and a 32 bit version.
